1.title: Aki
1.plot: Bride Aki has been planning her wedding for 16 months with no help from her childhood BFF and Maid of Honor, Kelly. But when the Bride finds out her absent Maid of Honor may be behind bars, she's forced to rethink her bridesmaid line-up.

2.title: Michelle
2.plot: After 24 years of being a single mom, Michelle is finally getting married. But with an emotionally overwhelmed daughter as her maid of honor, what was supposed to be an easy ceremony in Vegas is turning into a disaster.

3.title: Kara
3.plot: Kara's wedding is just around the corner, but she still has a major dilemma on her hands, choosing her maid of honor. And bitter bridesmaids rivals Claire the country girl she's known the longest and Sarah, her new best friend in LA fight for the title.

4.title: Brandy
4.plot: After a 5 year engagement, Brandy and Joe are finally getting married. But when her wedding venue burns down, she and her bickering bridal party scramble to find a new place before the big day.

5.title: Katey
5.plot: Katey can't wait to marry her childhood sweetheart, but her bridesmaids seem to be causing more harm than help. Katey's Maid of Honor Stephanie is overwhelmed with new motherhood, and Katey's high maintenance friend Amanda can only focus on herself!

6.title: Gabby
6.plot: Sparks ignite when an untraditional young bride wants her wedding party to dance down the aisle. Not everyone is enthusiastic about the plan, and when the bride's sister storms out of the rehearsal, the big day may end up a big disaster.

7.title: Eva
7.plot: Bride Eva is loud and proud when it comes to her Armenian heritage. The bride's sister-in-law is desperate to prove that SHE should be in the wedding party, so she challenges the Maid of Honor to a battle of bling.

imdb.plot outline: Planning a wedding is no piece of cake! Thank goodness for the invention of Bridesmaids... to help plan, organize, and support the bride through the most important and stressful time in her life. But not all Bridesmaids are created equal. Who will win the BFF competition and be crowned the Maid of Honor?
imdb.title: Along for the Bride
plot: Planning a wedding is no piece of cake! Thank goodness for the invention of Bridesmaids... to help plan, organize, and support the bride through the most important and stressful time in her life. But not all Bridesmaids are created equal. Who will win the BFF competition and be crowned the Maid of Honor?
